vote.title: Authorize a (1) two-year service contract for programs to mitigate Drivers of Poverty for the Office of Community Care - Harmony Community Development Corporation in the amount of $1,061,795 and After-School All-Stars in the amount of $310,000; and (2) one-year service contract for programs to mitigate Drivers of Poverty for the Office of Community Care - Bridge Steps dba The Bridge in the amount of $180,000 and I Look Like Love, Inc. dba iLookLikeLOVE, Inc.  in the amount of $48,496, most advantageous proposers of nine - Total not to exceed $1,600,291 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a (1) two-year service contract for programs to mitigate Drivers of Poverty for the Office of Community Care - Harmony Community Development Corporation in the amount of $1,061,795 and After-School All-Stars in the amount of $310,000; and (2) one-year service contract for programs to mitigate Drivers of Poverty for the Office of Community Care - Bridge Steps dba The Bridge in the amount of $180,000 and I Look Like Love, Inc. dba iLookLikeLOVE, Inc.  in the amount of $48,496, most advantageous proposers of nine - Total not to exceed $1,600,291 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
